Project.Brief history of your project and organi: M-Dreamer Ltd. is a Hongkong immersive technology company specializing in virtual reality (VR), AI-driven digital content, and 3D user-generated platforms. Since its founding in 2018, the company has focused on building interactive digital spaces for education, entertainment, and enterprise use. It launched its flagship platform M-World, which allows users to create, explore, and share immersive experiences and digital assets.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
1.	3D Virtual Scene Files
User-generated VR environments, objects, and interactions from the M-World platform.
2.	AI Model Training Data and Inference Results
Includes labeled image/video datasets and serialized AI model checkpoints for virtual characters and environmental rendering.
3.	Digital Assets and User-Created Content
Avatars, digital fashion items, custom scripts, and metadata from community creators.
4.	Platform Operation Logs
Backend logs, event data, and API usage metrics used for platform performance monitoring and auditing.
5.	Virtual Event Archives
High-resolution capture and interaction data from metaverse concerts, brand launches, and exhibitions.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
1.	Data Collection & Categorization
	•	Using internal data pipelines to collect UGC and AI outputs from M-World.
	•	Tagging and categorizing using custom scripts and metadata layers.
2.	Data Preprocessing
	•	For 3D files and videos: mesh optimization, resolution capping.
	•	For AI data: normalized format (JSON, Parquet), removal of PII.
3.	Compression & Packaging
	•	Tools: tar, zstd, gzip for large datasets.
	•	Segmentation into ~32GiB-64GiB CAR files.
4.	Data Validation
	•	Generate CIDs using Lotus or Boost.
	•	Run lotus client deal dry-run tests to simulate retrieval.
